tool_description: Automatic language detection for texts obtained from any kind of source (blog, twitter, online news and so on). Through statistic techniques based on N-grams evaluation, more than 60 languages are correctly identified.
title: Language Identification

api_list.name: Lang 2.0

optional_parameters.name: doc
optional_parameters.description: Input file with the content to analyze. The supported formats for file contents can be found at https://www.meaningcloud.com/developer/documentation/supported-formats, (if 'doc' has a value, 'url' and 'txt' must be empty)

optional_parameters.name: txt
optional_parameters.description: Input text. It can be plain text, HTML or XML, always using UTF-8 encoding, (if 'txt' has a value, 'url' and 'doc' must be empty)
optional_parameters.default: Last Friday we watched a terribly bad movie called "KÃ¡rate a muerte en Torremolinos", by an unknown Spanish director.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: URL of the content to analyze. Currently only non-authenticated HTTP and FTP are supported. The content types supported for URL contents can be found at https://www.meaningcloud.com/developer/documentation/supported-formats, (if 'url' has a value, 'txt' and 'doc' must be empty)

optional_parameters.name: threshold
optional_parameters.description: Language detection threshold as a percentage of similarity with respect to the top result

optional_parameters.name: selection
optional_parameters.description: List of expected languages, separated by |.

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description: When active, it shows additional information about the languages detected.
